text:
FELIX GREENE
1527 Byron Street, Palo Alto, California DAvenport 2-1998
October 9th 1958
Mr Robert E. Underwood, Jr.,
Network Manager,
N.A.E.B.,
Urbana, Ill.
Dear Mr Underwood;
How pleasantly prompt you are*. Yes, I shall
be glad to record the six talks for the payment you
mentioned, and I*m glad they may be of some use to
you.
There is no hurry about sending the check. I
hope to get the tapes recorded within the next two
or three days. I would be most interested to hear
what response you get from them.
Yours sincerely,’ ” .
Felix Greene
f
